DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to learn about normal body composition (% body fat) during the first six months of life in healthy breast-fed babies.
DOC.brief_title: Percent Body Fat in Breast Fed Infants
DOC.criteria: Term birth Infant must weigh at least 5.5# at birth Single birth Healthy mother/infant as determined by the investigator Intention to breast feed Significant perinatal morbidity Having health, environmental, or economic constraints on growth Infants of a mother with diabetes or gestational diabetes
